パッケージ io.github.townyadvanced.flagwar.config

クラス ConfigLoader

java.lang.Object
io.github.townyadvanced.flagwar.config.ConfigLoader
public class ConfigLoader extends Object
Handles loading of configuration files.

  • コンストラクタの概要

    ConfigLoader(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin bukkitPlugin)
    Constructs the ConfigLoader, linking the Plugin instance and Logger variables.

  • コンストラクタの詳細

    • ConfigLoader

      public ConfigLoader(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin bukkitPlugin)
      Constructs the ConfigLoader, linking the Plugin instance and Logger variables.
      パラメータ:
      bukkitPlugin - the Plugin to link to for both it's instance and logger.

  • メソッドの詳細

    • loadConfig

      public void loadConfig(double minConfigVer) throws IOException, org.bukkit.configuration.InvalidConfigurationException
      Intended to load the configuration. If the configuration version number is below the required version for safe operation, attempt regenerateConfiguration(File, File)
      パラメータ:
      minConfigVer - Minimum configuration version required. If not met, will attempt to back up and regenerate configuration.
      例外:
      IOException - Thrown if for any reason it cannot read the config file, or create the backup file.
      org.bukkit.configuration.InvalidConfigurationException - Thrown if the configuration file is invalid.

    • regenerateConfiguration

      public void regenerateConfiguration(File configFile, File backupFile) throws IOException
      Attempts to regenerate the configuration by first running backupConfig(File, File) then generating a fresh config.
      パラメータ:
      configFile - File on disk responsible for storing configuration.
      backupFile - File on disk responsible for storing old configuration.
      例外:
      IOException - Thrown if there are issues writing either the backupFile or the configFile.

    • backupConfig

      public boolean backupConfig(File sourceFile, File targetFile) throws IOException
      Attempts to clone the sourceFile's contents to the targetFile. Both files must exist to work.
      パラメータ:
      sourceFile - The source File, or the current configuration.
      targetFile - The target File to write to, or the backup. Writable file must pre-exist on disk.
      戻り値:
      True if a backup was successfully written to. False is returned if the TargetFile does not exist.
      例外:
      IOException - Thrown if the backup file exists, but is not writable - or if the source file does not exist or is not readable.
